name: Select2gether
tag_list: shopping, e-commerce, social, bookmarking, web-2-0, fashion, style, showroom, live-shopping, shopping-together, summit-at-stanford09
overview:
Select2gether is a live social platform powering real-time interaction. The Select2gether Live Showroom enables people to interact, view, and discuss products, photos, and videos live, thus enabling real time exchange and feedback from peers and friends.

Select2gether.com offers social interaction and exchange free of constraints. They combine live interaction, social web browsing and exchange, personal product and image archives, all accessible via PC and mobile device.

Select2gether members can start Live Showroom sessions on both a mobile device and PC. Users have the ability to store product images, photos and videos to be accessed again at any time. They are able to bring in items they find while browsing the Internet (by clicking and dragging) as well as items they find in the real world (by uploading mobile photos, UPC code and relevant product info).

The Select2gether social network also serves as a live advice environment, where members can solicit real-time input from friends, expert advisors and the network.

People can engage the unique, interactive Live Showroom in a multitude of ways including:

Select2gether.com: Destination site hosting real-time exchange, created by a community counting more than 5 million members.

WeLiket: The Select2gether toolbar which allows users to take the Live Showroom outside of Select2gether.com and use it with products from any website at any time.
